attributes.action: Give free credit checks for the foreseeable future to all the people effected by the HMRC child benefit blunder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government should make free credit checks available to all those people who's details have been lost by HMRC. The credit checks should not be a one off, but available as and when those effected want to check their credit rating.
